Howdy.

I'm Josh Riggs, a UX & visual designer at ThinkShout, formerly at Lullabot. I specialize in responsive design for large–scale websites, and I like to give talks on the subject. I'm also a photographer, an adventurer, and a pretty darn good cook. I'm married to this lovely lady, and currently hang my hat in Portland, Ore.
